com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit

Interface CampaignKitNotifier


  • public interface CampaignKitNotifier
    The CampaignKitNotifier keeps you informed of when a nearby beacon has triggered one of your Campaigns. Implement the notifier in a long running object for your app, such as an Application subclass.

    Here's a simplified example: 

    
 public class MyApplication extends Application implements CampaignKitNotifier {
     private static CampaignKitManager sCkManager = null;

     @Override
     public void onCreate() {
         // ... create the manager instance
         sCkManager.setNotifier(this);
         sCkManager.start();
     }

     @Override
     public void didFindCampaign(Campaign campaign) {
         Log.d("MyApp", "Did find campaign: " + campaign);
         // Display campaign for user
     }

     @Override
     public void didDetectPlace(Place place, CKEventType event) {
         Log.d("MyApp", "Did detect event (" + event + ") for place: " + place);
     }

     @Override
     public void didSync() {
         Log.d("MyApp", "didSync");
     }

     @Override
     public void didFailSync(CampaignKitSyncException e) {
         Log.e("MyApp", "didFailSync", e);
     }
 }

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CampaignKitNotifier.CKEventType
      A category reflecting what type of event occured to trigger didDetectPlace.

    • Method Detail

      • didFindCampaign

        void didFindCampaign(Campaign campaign)
        Invoked when a beacon or geofence is detected that is associated with an active campaign

        This callback can be used to take an action when a campaign is detected. Below is an example which triggers an alert view or local notification: 

        
     @Override
     public void didFindCampaign(Campaign campaign) {
         //adding Campaign to sightedCampaignArray, this will force it to be shown on the SightedCampaignList
         sightedCampaignArray.add(campaign);

         //sending notification or alert, depending on whether app is in background or foreground
         new CampaignNotificationBuilder(_mainActivity, campaign)
         .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.ic_launcher)
         .setOnClickActivity(DetailActivity.class)
         .show();

     }
        Parameters:
        campaign - The campaign that has been found.
        See Also:
        CampaignKitManager, Campaign, CampaignNotificationBuilder

      • didDetectPlace

        void didDetectPlace(Place place,
                  CampaignKitNotifier.CKEventType event)
        Invoked when a place is detected. This allows you to access the Proximity Kit Events that are happening underneath the Campaign Kit.
        Parameters:
        place -
        event -
        See Also:
        CampaignKitNotifier.CKEventType

      • didSync

        void didSync()
        Invoked after a successful registration with the Campaign Kit.

      • didFailSync

        void didFailSync(java.lang.Exception e)
        Invoked in the event of an unsuccessful registration with Campaign Kit. This could occur if the CampaignKit.properties file is missing or if the user has poor network reception.
        Parameters:
        e -
